attributes.action: Ban Anjem Choudary from appearing on Television and Radio
attributes.additional_details: Anjem Choudary is a proven hate preacher and supporter of Muslim extremism. He should be banned from appearing and speaking on Television and Radio. The BBC and other organisations are giving him air time to preach and spread his hatred of the West. He has even admitted that Lee Rigbys killers were his protegees. PLEASE SIGN AND FORWARD THIS PETITION TO AS MANY PEOPLE AS POSSIBLE. Lets get him off our screens then off our streets.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the media companies concerned.  However, there are laws already governing freedom of speech/incitement to hatred etc.
